properties.entry: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , NICKNAME , GRADE , MEM_POINT , MEM_VISIT , EMAIL FROM TB_MEMBER
SELECT MEM_NO ,GRADE ,MEM_ID ,MEM_PWD ,NICKNAME ,MEM_NAME ,EMAIL ,MBTI ,MEM_PHONE ,ENROLL_DATE ,MEM_STATUS ,MEM_VISIT ,MEM_BIRTHDAY ,MEM_POINT FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

SELECT RE_NO , RE_REF_NO , RE_WRITER , NICKNAME , RE_CONTENT , RE_LIKE_STAR , RE_DATE , RE_LEVEL FROM TB_REVIEW_REPLY JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = RE_WRITER) WHERE RE_ORIGIN_WRITER = ? AND RE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY RE_DATE DESC
